name: Fresh Watermelon and Cucumber Juice
description: Refreshing and tangy, this lightly flavored juice will keep you happily hydrated on hot summer days.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups (16 ounces) fresh watermelon juice from about 6 cups diced watermelon flesh
3/4 cup (6 ounces) fresh cucumber juice from about 1 large cucumber
1 1/2 teaspoons (1/4 ounce) fresh mint juice from about 15 mint leaves with stems
2 tablespoons (1 ounce) fresh lime juice from 1 to 2 limes

recipeInstructions.text: Stir juices together thoroughly (along with sugar, if using). Divide between two ice-filled glasses and serve immediately, or keep refrigerated for up to a day and stir well before serving.
